armenia.name: redstripe
armenia.meaning: the Armenian people's continued struggle for survival

armenia.name: bluestripe
armenia.meaning: the will of the people of Armenia to live beneath peaceful skies

armenia.name: yellowstripe
armenia.meaning: creative talent and hard-working nature of the people of Armenia

mauritius.name: greenstripe
mauritius.meaning: agriculture and color of the land

belize.name: redstripe_1
belize.meaning: Color of the opposition party of Belize

belize.name: blue_background
belize.meaning: Color of the Belize national party

belize.name: coatofarms
belize.meaning: The coat of arms recalls the logging industry that first led to British settlement in Belize.

belize.name: redstripe_2
belize.meaning: Color of the opposition party of Belize

kenya.name: black_stripe
kenya.meaning: The colour black represents the people of the Republic of Kenya.

kenya.name: redstripe
kenya.meaning: To symbolize the blood shed during the fight for independence.

kenya.name: greenstripe
kenya.meaning: To symbolize the countries wealth and natural landscape

kenya.name: shield
kenya.meaning: To symbolize the defense of all things Kenya.

kyrgyzstan.name: redbackground
kyrgyzstan.meaning: The red field stands for "bravery and valor", and alludes to Manas, the national hero of Kyrgyzstan.

kyrgyzstan.name: coatofarms
kyrgyzstan.meaning: to symbolize the "origin of life", the "unity of time and space", "hearth and home" and history.

cabo_verde.name: whitestripe_1
cabo_verde.meaning: To symbolize construction of the nation, and peace.

cabo_verde.name: redstripe
cabo_verde.meaning: To symbolize construction of the nation, and peace.

cabo_verde.name: stars
cabo_verde.meaning: The stars represent the main islands in the nation.

liechtenstein.name: redstripe
liechtenstein.meaning: The evening fires burning in peoples homes.

liechtenstein.name: crown
liechtenstein.meaning: Unity of the people and their prince.

maldives.name: redbackground
maldives.meaning: The boldness of the nations heroes.

maldives.name: crescent
maldives.meaning: The crescent represents the peoples Islamic faith.

malawi.name: blackstripe
malawi.meaning: Represents the indigenous people of the continent of Africa.

malawi.name: risingsun
malawi.meaning: Dawn of hope and freedom for Africa. The 31 rays of light represent that Malawi was the 31st nation at the time of its independence.

malta.name: whitestripe
malta.meaning: Said to be a gift from Roger I of Sicily.

malta.name: redstripe
malta.meaning: Said to be a gift from Roger I of Sicily.

malta.name: cross
malta.meaning: Flag of the Knights of Malta

mauritania.name: redstripe_1
mauritania.meaning: The efforts and sacrifices that the people of Mauritania will keep consenting, to the price of their blood, to defend their territory

mauritania.name: redstripe_2
mauritania.meaning: The efforts and sacrifices that the people of Mauritania will keep consenting, to the price of their blood, to defend their territory.

mongolia.name: coatofarms
mongolia.meaning: Represents fire, sun, moon, earth, water, and a round shape as dualist aspect.

saint_vincent_and_the_grenadines.name: bluestripe
saint_vincent_and_the_grenadines.meaning: The tropical skies and the crystal waters.

saint_vincent_and_the_grenadines.name: three_diamonds
saint_vincent_and_the_grenadines.meaning: Each represent an island of the Grenadines under Saint Vincent.

zambia.name: redstripe
zambia.meaning: The people of Zambia's struggle for freedom.

zambia.name: coatofarms
zambia.meaning: Represents the countries ability to rise above their problems.

sri_lanka.name: coatofarms
sri_lanka.meaning: The Sinhalese people, the four Buddhist virtues, the sovereignty of the nation, religious observance, elements and purity.

tajikistan.name: redstripe
tajikistan.meaning: Unity of the nation, victory, and sunrise.

tajikistan.name: whitestripe
tajikistan.meaning: Morality, purity, ice and snow of the mountains, and cotton.

tajikistan.name: greenstripe
tajikistan.meaning: Bountiful generosity of nature, fertile valleys, Islam, and the celebration of Novruz.

tajikistan.name: coatofarms
tajikistan.meaning: Represents the Tajik people. Seven stars as seven is a perfect number their culture and represents happiness.

slovenia.name: whitestripe
slovenia.meaning: The colors originate from the medieval coat of arms of the Duchy of Carniola.

slovenia.name: redstripe

portugal.name: greenstripe

portugal.name: redstripe
portugal.meaning: Represents the blood shed from the Portuguese people.

niger.name: orangestripe
niger.meaning: The northern regions in the Sahara desert.

niger.name: whitestripe
niger.meaning: Purity, and or, the River Niger.

niger.name: greenstripe
niger.meaning: Hope and fertile regions of southern Niger.

niger.name: orangecircle
niger.meaning: Represents the sun and or independence.

palau.name: bluebackground
palau.meaning: The ocean and the nations within it.

burkina_faso.name: greenstripe
burkina_faso.meaning: Agriculture and abundance of natural resources.

burkina_faso.name: star
burkina_faso.meaning: The guiding light of the revolution.

djibouti.name: greentrapezoid
djibouti.meaning: The everlasting green of the Earth and the Afar people.

djibouti.name: star
djibouti.meaning: Unity and the blood shed by the martyrs of independence.

south_sudan.meaning: South Sudan's peace attained after many years of the liberation struggle.
